titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mounted closed circuit television lenses.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16456-16457)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on mounted closed circuit television lenses.
